text: Jiří Prudil (born 28 June 1957) is a Czech rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Czechoslovakia Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Brno
title: Jiří Prudil
